reviewText: Very Hot with a couple of unique sexual twists that just add to the eroticism. If you love the idea of someone a little on the innocent side who discovers they want to be watched - Watch This Film !!

I had this one on an old VHS tape. This can now be retired, The language of the menu of the DVD was in Spanish, but all of the dialogue was in English, and everything was intact. If you've seen this movie, you know why you have to get if. If you've never seen this one, it's a little dated, but it is still spectacular.
One of the better skinemax flicks out there. Caught it when i was younger and it never left my mind. Better than anything they show on late night showtime these days. Jennifer burton is amazing!!

Jennifer Burton and Monique Parent sizzle in this film about two sexy couples (the husbands are law partners) who try a little trading off, except that Monique Parent's character's husband was not let in on the plan, and isn't too happy about it. His reaction threatens to break up their friendship and law practice. But then they each have a fling with the other's spouse, and decide they want to be with their original partner. This movie bares a lot of skin, and one of the best of the genre. Don't be put off by the Spanish language cover, everybody speaks English.
